If I had the opportunity to RT this multiple times I would. My notetaking has plummeted since we went remote and I don't feel investing in a notebook next semester. There are pros and cons to virtual learning but Zoom sessions are not it.Quote Tweet

In remote or in-person settings, the two-column note-taking method is an effective strategy for students to organize what they read into main ideas and details. #remoteteaching #remotelearning #distancelearning #distanceteaching #onlinelearning #notetakingThe Two-Column Method of Note-taking | Landmark Outreach
Learn about the two-column method of note-taking as a strategy to help students organize reading in to main ideas and details.

Before COVID-19 , weekends were meant for Netflix & chill but now they are replaced by webinars & notetaking. With everything moving remote, the number of webinars are definitely on the rise . Great to see founders/VCs/PMs/devs share their learnings to the inquisitive crowd :)

Prediction: it will be very surprising how much more productive people are when they have never have to break rhythm and slow down for a tedious task.

I am currently working from home and available for Remote Captioning, Electronic Notetaking and Lipspeaking services. 

No specialist equipment needed to receive captions - 
Skype/Zoom etc for audio and Wi-Fi enabled device to read captions.

ATW enquiries welcome.  #deaf #access
Seeing a growing number of products being built on top of Zoom. Everything from board games to notetaking. It‚Äôs the new platform for remote work. Shopify-like App Store coming soon?

Have you tried the note sharing feature in the #fillgi app to help with remote classes and virtual study groups? Now is a great time to try something new! Link in our bio #paperlessstudent #studygram #notetaking

My computing toolkit:
Surface Studio 2
Mac Mini
Surface Pro X

I remote into the Mac Mini via VNC for testing, design and some coding work.

I got the X because iPad Pro just can't do design work on the go.

// I still use the iPad for notetaking because Paper is hard app to quit

I am currently working from home and available for Remote Captioning, Electronic Notetaking and Lipspeaking services (with or without SSE). 

No specialist equipment is needed to receive captions - 
Skype/Zoom/landline for audio and Wi-Fi enabled device to receive captions.

We understand that these uncertain times can be difficult for our clients #Staysafe

We want to let you all know that we are still available to offer remote services, be that interpreting, Notetaking or educational support.

#BSL #Education #Deaf #Remote #interpreting #Notetaking
